definition: (bird species of China) crested ibis (Nipponia nippon)
surname Zhu
vermilion
cinnabar/see 硃砂|朱砂[zhu1 sha1]
spoonbill/ibis/family Threskiornithidae

sentences.english: The crested ibis was declared extinct in Japan in the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 二十世纪70年代在日本，朱鹮已被宣布濒绝。

sentences.english: The above-mentioned results indicate that Ningshan county is suitable for reintroduction test of the Crested Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 以上结果表明，宁陕县适于开展朱鹮再引入试验。

sentences.english: Some effective solutions to strengthen the Crested Ibis protection were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 并且提出了加强朱鹮保护的对策。

sentences.english: In fact, 7 wild crested ibis were found that time.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，当时在陕西也只发现了7只野生朱鹮。
